programme.title: Wildest Africa: Nile: An African Odyssey
programme.desc: The Nile is the longest river in the world. Ancient Egypt, one of the history's most powerful civilizations, depended hugely upon it. Each year, it flooded, replenishing the fields with fertile silt. This automatic irrigation fueled Egypt's economy.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Amazon River Islands: The Floating Forest
programme.desc: The Anavilhanas and Mariua archipelagos are deep in the heart of the Amazon rainforest. Flooded for 6 months of the year, the islands are a fortress of submerged trees. / Vancouver island is the largest island off the west coast of North America.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Patagonia: The Ends of the Earth
programme.desc: Patagonia is a place of extremes  of vast ice fields and snow-capped mountains; of windswept deserts, and violent oceans. Survival here means being tough enough to cope with brutal winters, and canny enough to exploit brief seasons of plenty.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Madagascar: Islands of Monsters
programme.desc: Madagascar is truly a weird and wonderful land. Isolated on an island of extreme and magical looking locations, life has adapted and diversified. With few predators, numbers have proliferated and natural selection has gone mad.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Vietnam: Phoenix from the Ashes
programme.desc: Around 10% of the world's species live in Vietnam, with tropical jungles fit to burst with wildlife. But less than 50 years ago, things were very different. During the war, Vietnam's forests were decimated, but as it always does, life fought back.

programme.desc: Fiery chef Gordon Ramsay puts two teams of aspiring chefs through a series of tough challenges. The teams meet new members before heading into a team challenge in which they must prepare a tasting menu for a dog show.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams roll the dice to determine the ingredients for their next team challenge, while a contestant leaves due to an injury. The cooks cater for music legends during dinner service, including Stewart Copeland and Steven Tyler.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Following the departure of two contestants from the competition, those remaining are challenged to create Indian-inspired meals, with the winning team earning a day of pampering at a luxurious spa.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay puts aspiring chefs through tough challenges. The teams are challenged to a blind taste test. Dinner service is held in honour of a group of decorated firefighters.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian tries to turn a crazy concept into reality and complete the front end.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian builds through a major issue with the roof.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian attempts to make a mold of the entire car.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian puts it all on the line to see if the custom car mold works.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian runs into issues as he attempts some last minute changes.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian and his most ambitious client break all the rules and build the ultimate boat-inspired, open-aired cruiser. (Part 1)

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian and his most ambitious client continue the ultimate open-aired cruiser build and debut it a top West Coast car show. (Part 2)

programme.title: Andromeda: Lost in a Space That Isn't There
programme.desc: The Abyss has infected Beka. The crew must find a way to save her.

programme.title: Andromeda: Abridging the Devil's Divide
programme.desc: After some of the crew is captured, Harper is forced to work on a time bridge for the Patriarch.

programme.title: Andromeda: Trusting the Gordian Maze
programme.desc: A spy from Tri Gemma shows up on the Andromeda in an attempt to steal the star map.

programme.title: Andromeda: A Symmetry of Imperfection
programme.desc: When Rommie becomes too emotional, the ship cuts her access in order to run diagnostics.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Abyss kills Beka's friend, and the crew must figure out what information they killed for.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda rescues a ship returning from peace talks with the Magog.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Stone Cold
programme.desc: In 2004, Brendan Percy was found dead of hypothermia and dehydration in a sub alpine area above Oamaru in suspicious circumstances.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: A Bump in the Night
programme.desc: In 1980, six-year-old Alicia O'Reilly was raped and murdered in her bed, while her sister slept less than a metre away, and her mother sleeping across the hallway.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken Out
programme.desc: Was Donovan Reidy deliberately run down and left to die? In 1995, 23-year-old Donovan Reidy was at a party when he got into a fight. A short while later, his bloodied body was found on the side of a major New Zealand highway.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Little Boy Lost
programme.desc: In 1957, nine-year-old Peter Boland was on holiday having the time of his life on a remote farm in New Zealand when he simply vanished without a trace. Peter’s older brother Gavin Boland, a self-confessed sceptic, turns to Sensing Murder’s psychics.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Death in a Heartbeat / The Body in the Bag
programme.desc: CI examines the Dr. Victor Chang extortion murder as well as the horrific Jane Doe Case where a girl is found lying on the side of the road of an inner Sydney suburb wrapped in two plastic garbage bags.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No Mercy: The Killing of Virginia Morse
programme.desc: The horrific story of killers Allan Baker and Kevin Crump who began their murderous spree in rural NSW by killing a complete stranger for $20, a packet of cigarettes and a couple of litres of petrol.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Hunt for a Killer: The Claremont Murders
programme.desc: This chilling CIA episode details the long and difficult investigation which began with the disappearance of 18-year-old secretary Sarah Spiers from a night club in the up-market Perth suburb of Claremont on Australia Day 1996.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Kid for Ransom / Tears for Daniel
programme.desc: We examine two notorious abduction cases. The first case is the Graeme Thorne ransom kidnapping at Bondi in 1960. Thorne, aged eight, was the son of winners of the Sydney Opera House Lottery.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Assassination of John Newman
programme.desc: John Paul Newman was a member of the New South Wales state parliament and a member of the seat of Cabramatta.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Wind Change
programme.desc: Jodi and Alberto are forced to move back to Drovers Run when they are kicked out of their apartment in town after being unable to pay the rent. Meg is happy to have her daughter back but it may be too much of a good thing.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: No More Mr. Nice Guy
programme.desc: On the eve of the Gungellan Show, Claire is presented with repossession papers for Drovers Run, a result of her defaulting on her contract with Australian Bloodlines.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Future Perfect
programme.desc: Peter offers to stop Australian Bloodline's from repossessing Drovers if Claire will agree to marry him. After ultimately rejecting Peter's offer, Claire takes him on in the Stockman's Challenge but is seriously injured in a fall.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Fairy Tale Ending
programme.desc: Meg agonises over whether to send more money to Jodi who is still on her overseas travels, and using up her mum's funds like there's no tomorrow.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Better the Devil You Know
programme.desc: Alex and Claire's secret brings one family together and brings another to the brink.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Road Home
programme.desc: After months of searching, Becky finally finds out what happened to Brick. She and Jodi discover the horrible truth after Becky is led to Brick by a dream.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Bernt Bodal is the CEO of American Seafoods, one of the largest seafood companies in the United States. He is going undercover to look for ways for the company to grow.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghost of Buffalo Bill
programme.desc: The TAPS team has been called to wrangle some ghosts that seem to be haunting the resting place of Buffalo Bill.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 7
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Crossing Over
programme.desc: TAPS calls in the GHI team to investigate the Spalding Inn, a historic property in Whitefield, New Hampshire owned by Jason and Grant.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Give Me Liberty or Give Me Corpses
programme.desc: The house, formerly owned by the \\"Father of American Surgery,\\" harbors a dark secret deep beneath its floors. Now restless spirits inhabit the home in which they were once the subjects of experiments and research.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: New Hampshire Gothic
programme.desc: The TAPS team heads to New Hampshire to help a group of volunteers figure out what is causing the lively paranormal activity in their otherwise quiet museum.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: This One's For You
programme.desc: Dog leads the team on another adrenaline-filled chase in Denver. The fugitive, Robert, has a habit of address-hopping that makes him a difficult target, but Dog refuses to give up and finally tracks Robert down in his latest hideaway.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby Lyssa Steps Up
programme.desc: The team is still in Colorado, and today Dog starts his day by to giving his kids and crew a sample of their western heritage by taking them horseback riding. This hunt takes Dog back to his old stomping grounds in Denver.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Running on Empty
programme.desc: Dog's time is running out in Colorado. After a month of helping his bail bondsmen friends around Denver, he's got to get his family back home to Hawaii. But Dog wants one more capture before they leave.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Inside Out
programme.desc: Dog kickstarts the search for Jackson, a 240lbs, six feet tall bad boy who has skipped out on a $10,000 bond. Jackson’s apparently at his father-in-law's house, but the father-in-law has info about Jackson that brings Dog to a unique hideout.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Growing Up Is Hard To Do
programme.desc: With twelve kids of his own, Dog knows how hard it is to keep children on the straight and narrow, especially during their turbulent teens.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Year of the Dog
programme.desc: A one-hour special that looks back at 2006, one of Dog's most tumultuous years, which has included the passing of Beth's father, Dog and Beth's wedding, the tragic death of Dog's daughter Barbara.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Mystery of Mona Lisa
programme.desc: When Lyssa points out that the fugitive in the next case has the same birth date as Barbara, Dog's recently deceased daughter, the team takes a special vow to capture the young woman.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rusty Cuffs
programme.desc: Dog finds himself fighting two enemies; the law and his inner demons. He continues his legal battle to fight extradition to Mexico in connection with his 2003 capture of fugitive rapist Andrew Luster. His other struggle is private.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Half in the Bag
programme.desc: After Si has started moonlighting as a grocery bagger, the guys show up at the store and their teasing inadvertently causes Si to lose his job and his chance to enter a local bagging competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: There Will Be Flood
programme.desc: When a large storm hits Monroe, most of the adults head to Phil and Kay's to help protect their house from flooding while Jess, Sadie, Rebecca and Cole babysit the kids. Meanwhile, Jep, Si, Martin and Godwin try to protect the Duck Commander.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bingo Star
programme.desc: Willie accompanies Kay to a local bingo tournament and gets seduced by the game, eventually embarrassing himself and Kay with his enthusiasm.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sadie's Choice
programme.desc: Willie takes Sadie on a tour of a local college in hopes of convincing her to stay nearby after her impending high school graduation.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Children of the Cornbread
programme.desc: When the Robertson brothers debate which of their wives makes the best cornbread, it escalates into a full-on cornbread cook off. Meanwhile, when Jep, Martin, and Godwin play a practical joke on Uncle Si, it ends up being Si who has the last laugh.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Whole Lotta Bull
programme.desc: The guys enjoy a one-day rodeo fantasy camp where they learn the ins and outs of riding, roping and clowning.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Comes the Son
programme.desc: After leaving school to pursue music, Jase feels that Reed needs some structure in his life, so he hires him to take his place at Duck Commander.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bro'd Trip
programme.desc: Jase accompanies Willie on a business trip to Arkansas to pitch a new product and has unorthodox sales strategies. Back in Monroe, Jep and Si have to track down an important item of Willie's that they accidentally shipped out.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie thinks his kids have been spending too much time on their phones and other devices so he initiates a "No-Tech Week," but when he has to participate too it ends up being harder than he thought. There's a lice outbreak at Duck Command.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The West Monroe Wing
programme.desc: Willie and Jase run against each other to become president of their neighborhood HOA. Jep, Jess and Miss Kay work on a Duck Commander themed display for the local zoo.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Automation Frustration
programme.desc: Willie buys a 3D printer for the office that starts off as a fun distraction for the guys until it appears the printer could soon replace their jobs. Si is upset that Willie invested in the 3D printer and didn't give him a raise.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Several SAR teams are called out after 200 snowmobilers arereported buried on Boulder Mountain near Revelstoke BC.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler SAR extracts a severely injured stunt snowmobiler. And later, teams search for two people swept down a raging river.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler Search and Rescue helicopter long-lines an injured snowmobiler off a steep mountainside.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In Crawford Bay near Nelson British Columbia, search teams are looking for a missing 1946 two-seater vintage Ercoupe.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler Search and Rescue combs the backcountry for a missing snowshoer.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR takes a maiden voyage in their new rescue boat to save a single mother and her young son.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Lions Bay and North Shore Rescue team up to long-line a severely injured French mountain climber off a steep rock face.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson Search and Rescue is en route to the scene of a helicopter crash in the Kootenay River.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson Search and Rescue rookies get a chance to show their stuff while helping an injured hiker.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR uses underwater drop cameras to find a missing jet skier in the Kootenay River.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Once a Cheater Always a Cheater
programme.desc: Alyssia says Devonte is a serial cheater, but wants to save their relationship. He says she's insecure and stalks his social media. They share a child, but Devonte doesn't want to commit if she won't change. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Speak My Truth
programme.desc: Chante says her boyfriend, Steve of 8 years is trying to end her “hot girl summer.” Not only that, but he doesn’t trust her, is controlling and wants to marry her. Chante isn’t ready for marriage and just wants to have fun.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Down in the DM
programme.desc: Clifford feels that Asia is always searching for things that aren’t there. Asia says she is done with Clifford and the way he uses social media to flirt and cheat with women. Can Judge Lynn Toler help put a stop to the arguing?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Quanasia can no longer deal with Chandler's lying just so he can have his affairs. Chandler says she lost her drive after having his kids. Can Judge Toler wake her up from Chandler's hypnotizing charm or is this couple a lost cause?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Brexit
programme.desc: Over 17 years of marriage Leon has had countless affairs with other women and Siobhan has had it. She claims all he wants is for her to keep his house clean and pick up after him. Leon argues that the problems stem from Siobhan’s bad drinking habits.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Done Done
programme.desc: Nichele says Stewart would pay the neighbors to spy on her. She says he was never supportive when it came to parenting. Stewart says Nichele has always denied cheating on him but he believes in his heart she did.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Fantasy Fail
programme.desc: Victoria is sick of Casey neglecting his responsibilities. Casey feels like a slave for taking care of the kids while she flies around the world for modeling gigs. Can Casey break out of the Mr. Mom role and start helping with the bills?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Uninvited Guest Part 1
programme.desc: Jacoby Garrett is fighting to save his marriage of 15 years. Meanwhile his wife, Kim Garrett has her belongings packed and is waiting on the moving truck.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Uninvited Guest Part 2
programme.desc: Jacoby says his wife has stolen money to feed her gambling addiction. Kim says that his mother is a huge thorn in her side. In 15 years, Kim says she is still scratching her head as to why Jacoby’s mother bad mouths her to everyone.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Sun
programme.desc: When Milton came into Sona’s life, all the stars were aligned but now their relationship has been out of orbit. Sona is a firm believer in astrology and zodiac signs, but this Leo can no longer tolerate the cheating ways of Milton who is an Aries.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Secret Lies
programme.desc: Billy wants Marylu to quit pole dancing and stripping, while she wants Billy to confess if he’s straight or not. Billy has a fetish for wearing women’s underwear and he needs to fess up if he likes women, men or both.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Player of the Year
programme.desc: Jordan says that Taurean is the biggest player with the ladies and still decides to lie about it even after she gave him a chance to have an open relationship. He says he talks to other women because Jordan is unaffectionate and verbally abusive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Luv Still
programme.desc: Dog is in search of a potentially dangerous fugitive, he's only 19 and charged with kidnapping and menacing. The case takes an unexpected turn when the Chapman clan ends up in a confrontation with the suspect's family.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Bags and Boxers
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surface Scratches
programme.desc: Dog's latest quarry is running from abuse and assault charges. As Dog investigates, he discovers that this fugitive has gamed the system by jumping from one bond, and one bondsman, to another.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Facebooked
programme.desc: Dog is in Denver helping Bobby Brown to track down a fugitive with a long rap sheet. But unfortunately they have no picture of the felon to work with, so the challenges are big on this one. But Dog discovers a new source; "Facebook".

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Business
programme.desc: Dog and the Chapman clan start their hunt today with another well-established bail bonding family. As Dog's fame has grown, so have his responsibilities.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Reality Check
programme.desc: Dog is back in Denver and in hot pursuit of a woman wanted for identity theft. The sad reality is that the identify which has been robbed is her own. She's traded in a bright future for a life on the wrong side of the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Stormy Weather
programme.desc: Going after two fugitives in one day is tough enough without the facing Colorado's notoriously unpredictable weather. Today, it's the threat of severe thunderstorms, hail and area wide tornado warnings.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Father-Hood
programme.desc: Before Tim heads out for a tough day of bounty hunting, he likes to get in a little quality time with his daughter, Summer Rain.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Searchers
programme.desc: Dog is still on the search for the elusive fugitive, Marco. Dog has been tracking him across Colorado, from Grand Junction to Denver, and now a hot tip that a long time associate of his is hiding in Pueblo sends the team racing south.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Hot Girl On Girl Action
programme.desc: Jennifer’s keeping a surprising secret from Lynn

programme.title: Girlfriends: Sleeping Dogs
programme.desc: Maya accuses Darnell of infidelity.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Rat inThe House Episode
programme.desc: When a rat gets lost in the home, Kevin scurries to care for it. Meanwhile, an ex-flame creates surging tension between Lindsey and Gigi.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Booty Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne isn't a sport when Nick watches a game with friends at a sports bar with alluring waitresses. Elsewhere, the children ask for more allowance, but they reject doing any added chores.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Viral Video Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne becomes a viral-video sensation after she's caught dancing on camera. Meanwhile, Marilyn serves up soul-food lessons to young Lindsey.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Michelle Obama Sweater Episode
programme.desc: Lindsey taps into her mother's credit card to order a sweater. Elsewhere, Kevin feigns being ill to score a coveted baseball jersey.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The No Nah Nah Episode
programme.desc: An exhausted Nick resists Suzanne's romantic advances, leading her to worry about the health of their relationship.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Get Together Episode
programme.desc: Nick recommends throwing a social event with family and friends in a bid to strengthen family ties, but his sloppy planning results in chaos.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Mr. Himdependent Episode
programme.desc: When Suzanne's ex-husband wants to lower his monthly child support payments, Nick jumps at the chance to get rid of Frank's financial support, while Suzanne has mixed feelings about Frank.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The We Ain't Going Out Like That Episode
programme.desc: When Nick tries to be spontaneous, but Suzanne resists and instead plans a date night that fails, they attempt to be spontaneous together--until they realize it's better if she makes plan.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Oh No She Di-in't Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne grows jealous of Nick's pretty young field producer. Elsewhere, Gigi falls for a man, who has children, so she enlists Kevin and Lindsey to help her better relate to kids.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hostage to Fear
programme.desc: P.R.S. is summoned to help a family who has been haunted for years by spirits lurking in the house. Upon arrival the team finds a family that has become prisoners in their own home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Homecoming
programme.desc: Ryan brings PRS to his hometown of Sumter, SC to investigate a chilling case where a young boy was tragically shot and killed on a front doorstep while trick-or-treating on Halloween.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Laws of Attraction
programme.desc: When Paula's young autistic son Michael, with limited verbal skills uttered the words "Go away scary dead boy" -- it sent a chill up her spine.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Room 37
programme.desc: Darrell and Cherry, the owners of an historic Tennessee bed and breakfast built in the late 1800s, are reporting apparitions of a man and hearing whistling throughout the hotel corridors.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Return of the Dead: Glove II
programme.desc: PRS returns to the site of one of their most famous cases, Daisytown, PA, where they had discovered a glove print of an old miner that they determined was the spirit of a Great-Grandfather.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Ranch
programme.desc: PRS saddles up to a remote ranch in Hunt, Texas where black shadows are being spotted and animals harmed. What's more, a mysterious crop circle has formed on the property and the horses refuse to cross it.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Ladder

programme.desc: Ben Stiller travels to Northern Scotland to face the Isle of Skye's rugged mountains. Stiller discusses his background while they navigate slippery terrain, searching for food and clean water.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Uzo Aduba

programme.title: World's Greatest: Mountains
programme.desc: The earth’s fragile crust has folded and faulted, and nowhere are these natural forces more evident than in the world’s great mountains. Explore the highest peaks of the world’s terrain - the rugged realm between heaven and earth.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Land Adventures
programme.desc: Most land adventures come with some risk - a chance to confront our deepest fears, resist the pull of the ordinary, and soar into the wild unknown.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Grassland Animals
programme.desc: Grasslands are the great stages of the natural world where large animals play out spectacular lives in clear view of people, including lions, leopards, elephants, rhinoceros, cheetahs, impalas, kangaroos, wallaby, potoroo, bison, and wolves.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Island Arks
programme.desc: Cut off from continents, remote islands have become floating arks, attracting migrating species and forging new ones. Take a privileged glimpse into the secret lives of the rare and exotic species that inhabit these lost worlds.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Coral Islands
programme.desc: The reef systems that gave rise to coral islands support the vast majority of marine species on our planet, but they are under threat. Explore the delicate balance between exploiting and preserving these extraordinary natural wonders.

programme.title: Arthur: Fern and the Case of the Stolen Story/Sue Ellen Vegges Out
programme.desc: Fern has writer's block! Fortunately, Ladonna's full of stories, and Fern decides to "borrow" the tales and simply change the names. Then, when Sue Ellen decides to stop eating meat, Muffy and Francine compete to be the best vegetarian.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur and D.W. Clean Up/The Long, Dull Winter
programme.desc: Arthur just might make it to Happy Crazy Wow Day at the park--if he and D.W. can work together to clean their rooms! Then, Arthur and the gang realize they are suffering from the January doldrums brought on by an acute lack of holidays.

programme.title: Arthur: Attack Of The Turbo Tibbles/D.W. Tricks The Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: If you think the Tibbles are bad now, imagine what they'd be like if they had super powers! Then, D.W. needs money, quick. When she tries to pull a fast one on the Tooth Fairy, will Arthur have to pay?

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's New Puppy/Arthur Bounces Back
programme.desc: Arthur's new puppy is exactly what he wanted. He's cute and wriggly, and he follows Arthur everywhere. But training a puppy is harder than Arthur thought. Then, a mere $10 stands between Arthur and the shoes he's been dreaming about.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur and The Crunch Cereal Contest/D.W. Flips
programme.desc: A year's supply of Crunch Cereal is in store for the person who can write the new Crunch Cereal jingle, and Arthur is sure he can do it. Next, how hard can it be to do a cartwheel on a balance beam? D.W. is about to find out.

programme.title: Arthur: Adventures in Budylon/Ladonna Compson: Party Animal
programme.desc: D.W. and Bud embark on an epic wilderness adventure--the backyard has never been so exciting! Apple picking, bake sales, craft classes…there's so much to do in Elwood City in the fall! And Ladonna's determined to do it all.

programme.title: Arthur: Whip. Mix. Blend./Staycation
programme.desc: When Rattles's mom starts dating Archie Vanderloo, Rattles finds himself spending time with his twins, but they don’t have anything in common. Arthur offers to babysit so that his parents can enjoy some peace and quiet in the backyard.

programme.title: Arthur: The Cherry Tree/Matchmaker Matchbreaker
programme.desc: Muffy wants a Bouncy Castle at her party, but when her favorite cherry tree is cut down to make room for it, she starts to have regrets. Francine and Muffy scheme to set up their older siblings Chip and Catherine, but plans go awry.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W., All Fired Up/I'd Rather Read It Myself
programme.desc: When Ms. Morgan announces they'll be having a fire drill during preschool, D.W. wants no part of it--it sounds way too scary. Then, the Tibble Twins are better than D.W. at just about everything.

programme.title: Hitler's Propaganda Machine: Power and Persuasion
programme.desc: This episode explores Hitler's approach to propaganda in power; where persuasion was achieved through propaganda and terror, all in service of one goal: the creation of a state under one shared ideology. A new German power fueled by propaganda.

programme.title: Hitler's Propaganda Machine: Why We Fight
programme.desc: This episode explores the way Hitler used propaganda to justify his warmongering, reframing it as defense of Germany’s people and borders. It investigates the role propaganda played for both Hitler and the Allies to mobilize their countries for war.

programme.title: War Wrecks: The Untold Stories: The Tragic Sinking of Leopoldville
programme.desc: On the 24th of December 1944, 2 237 American soldiers of the 66th Infantry Division are aboard the Steamer Léopoldville.

programme.title: War Wrecks: The Untold Stories: Secret Bunkers of Omaha Beach
programme.desc: On June 6th 1944, Lieutenant-colonel Rudder’s Rangers company climbs the cliffs of the Pointe du Hoc in Normandy with the mission to destroy the German cannons.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Neil & Jasmin
programme.desc: Neil has been chatting to Jasmin for 3 years and she's stood him up 13 times. So it's up to Julie and Oobah to find out if the person Neil has fallen for...is real? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: After being Catfished by her best friend, Larissa turned to online pal Anthony for support. Feelings between them grew, but after some suspicious moves, Larissa is worried he is also lying. (S5, ep14)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Nev and Max receive emails from opposite sides of the same online romance, each concerned that the other may be a catfish! What happens next leaves Nev and Max stunned! (S6, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Leanne & Jamie
programme.desc: Leanne is desperate to find out if online love Jamie is her Mr Right. After cancelling on her numerous times, Leanne wants Oobah and Nella to investigate and finally bring them face to face. (S2, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Luis has fallen for a single mum, and now he's ready to take their online relationship to the next level. But first Nev and Max must help him make sure that she is who she says she is! (S5, ep19)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Cassie & Steve
programme.desc: Cassie was on a downward spiral until she got a friend request from a rapper named Steve. Two and a half years later, Cassie and Steve are engaged - but they have yet to meet.

programme.title: The Hills: Lauren and Jason: Part 2
programme.desc: When Jason, Lauren's ex flame from Laguna Beach, reappears in her life, Lauren thinks she may not be over him. Meanwhile, Heidi asks if the price of a new job is worth paying for. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: The Hills: Jason's Birthday
programme.desc: After a Teen Vogue event, Lauren hurries to get home to Jason for his birthday. However, things don't end up so well when Jason only wants to hang out with his friends. (S1, ep5)

programme.title: The Hills: Boyfriends and Work Don't Mix
programme.desc: Jason becomes a distraction in Lauren's life, Heidi finally gets her big chance to work in the nightclub, and when a model drops out from a Teen Vogue fashion show, Whitney steps in. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: The City: Good Things Come In Threes
programme.desc: Whitney dates a new guy and Jay confesses to Adam his true feelings about Whitney. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: The City: Boys Night Out
programme.desc: Adam lets loose while his girlfriend Allie is out of town, but when she hears he kissed another girl from Whitney and the others, Adam finds himself in hot water. (S1, ep5)

programme.title: The City: He Never Said He Had a Girlfriend
programme.desc: Allie breaks down after a run in with the girl who claims she kissed Adam, but Adam sticks to his story to win Allie back, and Whitney gets upset with Jay for taking Adam's side. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: The City: The Truth Hurts
programme.desc: Kelly Cutrone accuses Allie of being too skinny, and Whitney finds herself caught in the middle. Erin runs into an ex-boyfriend and old feelings begin to return. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: The City: Mingling with the Commoners
programme.desc: Olivia invites Jay's band to perform at one of her charity events but her plan backfires when the band is disrespected on-stage, leaving Whitney and Olivia at odds. (s1, ep8)

programme.title: The City: Unexpected Roommates
programme.desc: Adam kicks Jay out of his apartment so Allie can move in &amp; Jay asks Whitney if he can live with her. Erin's plan to juggle two guys backfires &amp; leaves her alone on New Year's Eve. (S1, ep9)

programme.title: The City: The Past Catches Up
programme.desc: When the gang goes to Miami for the weekend, Jay runs into his ex-girlfriend Danielle and Whitney wonders if the rumours about them might be true after all. (S1, ep10)

programme.title: The Hills: Somebody Always Has to Cry
programme.desc: It's the gang's first holiday in LA but not everyone gets what they wish for. A New Year's kiss is hard to come by for Lauren when Jason learns she got a call from an old flame. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Alternate Suspects
programme.desc: A football coach serves nine years in prison for the murder of his wife before a Texas Court of Criminal Appeals finds he didn't get a fair trial.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Pain and Gain
programme.desc: A report about the crimes of the Sun Gym gang, a group of Miami, Florida drifters, petty thieves, and bodybuilders who kidnapped and killed wealthy people to fuel their lifestyle.

programme.title: 48 Hours: OJ Simpson: Endgame
programme.desc: The OJ Simpson trial for the murder of Nicole Brown Simpson and Ron Goldman, the controversy that surrounded it, the impact it had on race relations, including the current and recent uproar over race, patriotism, and free speech in America.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Stranger You Know
programme.desc: A report about Marti Hill, who was savagely beaten in her Prairie Village, Kansas home. She was found by police barely breathing and covered in blood.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Spies, Lies and Secrets
programme.desc: A report about the death of Shane Todd, a brilliant, high-tech engineer at a Singapore company who, according to his parents, was murdered because he was unwilling to share secrets that could harm the United States.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Relentless
programme.desc: A woman wages a psychological war against the person she believes killed her daughter.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Weighty Problem/U.S. Acres: The Worm Turns/Good Cat, Bad Cat
programme.desc: Garfield tampers with the new talking scale./Booker's hunt for worms comes to a stop./Garfield's good and bad side battle for control.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Legend of the Lake/Double-Oh Orson/The Black Book
programme.desc: Garfield lectures a group about a famous water voyage./Orson imagines himself a famous secret agent./Jon gives Garfield his "little black book" to hide.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield's Moving Experience/U.S. Acres: Wade: You're Afraid/Good Mousekeeping
programme.desc: Garfield decides to move away from home./Orson hypnotizes Wade./Garfield must rid the house of mice.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Binky Goes Bad/Barn of Fear/Screaming with Binky
programme.desc: A criminal disguises himself as Binky to commit crimes./Orson and crew must spend the night in the old barn./Binky visits an operating room.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield goes to the Lamaar School of Cats. Roy Rooster learns the art of doublespeak.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Jon gets to meet Vivacia, the TV horror show hostess of his dreams. Wade Duck is caught in a 60-minute style interview.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: After falling asleep while playing a board game, Jon dreams he and Garfield are in it.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield demonstrates the importance of sound effects. The Wolf convinces the crew aliens have landed.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield’s neighbor moves out and rent their house to a singer.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Myron the Mouse tries to goad Garfield into chasing him. Edward R. Furrow is back psychoanalyzing the weasel and Orson.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Crack-Up
programme.desc: Jim Phelps poses as a master chess champion to trap a criminal with a near-genius mentality and his mysterious boss.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Puppet
programme.desc: Roddy McDowall guest stars as Leo Ostro, a brilliant crime syndicate boss who becomes the target of the IMF when he launches a mysterious one-hundred-million-dollar scheme.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Incarnate
programme.desc: Kim Hunter guest stars as Hannah O'Connel a brilliant but superstitious criminal who escapes to a Caribbean country and is drawn into a voodoo ceremony by the IMF to locate a cache of stolen gold she has hidden away.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Boomerang
programme.desc: Laraine Stephens guest stars as the beautiful wife of a crime syndicate boss who becomes the target of both the underworld and the Impossible Missions Force when she has her husband killed and steals his records of the syndicate's operations.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Question
programme.desc: Elizabeth Ashley guest stars as a beautiful IMF agent who becomes the key to determining if enemy agent Nicholai Varsi is telling the truth when he claims he's defecting to the United States.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: BJ's Really Cool House
programme.desc: Although the park may be a home away from home for Barney and his friends, BJ wants to build his own "totally awesome, completely cool" house. While BJ works on his house, Barney and the children learn all about houses and homes.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: The Emperor's Contest - The Whole Truth
programme.desc: Everyone is excited about a fishing contest that is being held in the park; everyone except Ryan, who doesn't want to follow the contest rules. When Ryan is tempted not to follow the rules, Barney tells a story called "The Emperor's Contest."

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Riff can’t find his drumsticks anywhere. Barney helps Baby Bop explore many different jobs.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Mother Goose - Fun With Reading
programme.desc: While playing in the caboose, BJ is surprised to learn that "The Land of Mother Goose" truly exists. Several Mother Goose characters have come to ask for help! Parts of their rhymes are missing! When Mother Goose arrives, she fixes the problem.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Bunches of Boxes!

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Stephen Port

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Highjacked
programme.desc: With a reporter on board, the Taelon mother ship is highjacked into interdimensional space. Liam is the prime suspect, causing an even bigger rift between Da'an and Zo'or. As the ship floats, lost in space, they must find the real culprit.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Defector

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Heroes and Heartbreak

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Message in a Bottle

programme.title: The Lost World: Suspicion

programme.title: The Lost World: The Imposters

programme.title: The Lost World: Tapestry

programme.title: The Lost World: Legacy
